effect.en: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, your opponent discards all cards from his or her hand.
effect.fr: Lancez 2 pièces. Si vous obtenez deux fois un côté face, votre adversaire défausse toutes les cartes de sa main.

effect.en: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Sharpedo.
effect.fr: Inflige 50 dégâts plus 10 dégâts supplémentaires pour chaque marqueur de dégât placé sur Sharpedo.

description.en: It can swim at speeds of 75 mph by jetting seawater through its body. It is the bandit of the sea.
